column1: * Beren hears Lúthien singing and awakes from his trance. They fall in love.
* Thingol commands Beren to return with a Silmaril in exchange for Lúthiens hand in marriage. Quest for the Silmaril.
* Beren departs Nargothrond with Finrod and ten companions (including Edrahil). Finrod appoints Orodreth as regent.

column3: Finrod and companions are captured by Sauron.

column1: * Lúthien leaves Doriath seeking Beren; she encounters Celegorm and Curufin who take her to Nargothrond. She escapes Nargothrond with the aid of Huan.
* Death of Finrod and his ten companions in Tol-in-Gaurhoth.
* Huan and Lúthien arrive at Tol-in-Gaurhoth. Huan kills Draugluin and defeats wolf-Sauron in battle; Sauron flees in the form of a Vampires and goes to Taur-nu-Fuin.
* Celegorm and Curufin are banished from Nargothrond and subsequently attack Beren and Lúthien. Huan betrays his master out of love for Lúthien. Beren leaves for Angband.
